name: Attuned_Touch_of_the_Nictus_C
display_name: Attuned Touch of the Nictus C
display_fullname: Boosts.Attuned Touch of the Nictus C
display_help: Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, the healing potential and damage absorption of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Heal.Scale}%. NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into healing powers that require a To Hit check.
